creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund, by exchange
description: abstract image; pink, yellow, red and brown ground with applied mostly rectangular and square pieces of printed fabric with floral and animal prints; one bead (?) on top center piece of fabric with black ground and flower print; received unframed
medium: Acrylic and fabric collage ("femmage") on canvas
signed: on back in brown: Miriam Schapiro / 1972 / \"Eurydice\"
title: Eurydice
